contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox cricketer | name = Qaiser Ali | image = cricket no pic.png | caption = | batting = Right-handed [[batsman]] | bowling = Right arm [[off spin]] | columns = 2 | column1 = [[One Day International|ODIs]] | matches1 = 12 | runs1 = 195 | bat avg1 = 17.72 | 100s/50s1 = 0/2 | top score1 = 70 | deliveries1 = 26 | wickets1 = 0 | bowl avg1 = 0 | fivefor1 = - | tenfor1 = - | best bowling1 = - | catches/stumpings1= 2/0 | column2 = [[First-class cricket|First-class]] | matches2 = 5 | runs2 = 476 | bat avg2 = 68.00 | 100s/50s2 = 1/3 | top score2 = 174 | deliveries2 = 66 | wickets2 = 1 | bowl avg2 = 40 | fivefor2 = - | tenfor2 = - | best bowling2 = 1/14 | catches/stumpings2= 3/0 | international = true | country = Canadian | odidebutfor =   | odidebutagainst =   | odidebutdate = August 5 | odidebutyear = 2006 | lastodidate = March 14 | lastodifor =   | lastodiagainst =   | lastodiyear = 2007 | testdebutfor = | testdebutagainst = | testdebutdate = August 5 | testdebutyear = 2006 | lasttestdate = March 14 | lasttestfor = | lasttestagainst = | lasttestyear = 2007 | source = http://content-aus.cricinfo.com/canada/content/current/player/216920.html Cricinfo | date = | year = }} '''Qaiser Ali''' (born 20 December 1978 in [[Rawalpindi]], [[Pakistan]]) is a [[Canada|Canadian]] [[cricket]] player. He played one [[List A cricket|ListA]] match for Rawalpindi B in his native Pakistan in 1995, but moved to Canada later in life. He made his debut for [[Canadian cricket team|Canada]] in the [[ICC Intercontinental Cup]] against [[Bermudian cricket team|Bermuda]], and has played four matches in the competition in all. He also played two [[One Day International]]s against [[Kenyan cricket team|Kenya]] in August 2006. {{Canada ODI Cricket Captains}} {{Canada Squad 2007 Cricket World Cup}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Qaiser,Ali | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Canadian cricketer | DATE OF BIRTH = 20 December 1978 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Qaiser, Ali}} [[Category:1978 births]] [[Category:Canada One Day International cricketers]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Rawalpindi cricketers]] [[Category:Canadian people of Pakistani descent]] [[Category:Canadian sportspeople of Asian descent|Ali]] {{Canada-cricket-bio-stub}}
